data.name: InvalidLoggingMethodNameMessage
data.value: Logging method names cannot start with _

data.name: InvalidLoggingMethodParameterNameMessage
data.value: Logging method parameter names cannot start with _

data.name: LoggingMethodInNestedTypeMessage
data.value: Logging class cannot be in nested types

data.name: MissingRequiredTypeTitle
data.value: Could not find a required type definition

data.name: MissingRequiredTypeMessage
data.value: Could not find definition for type {0}

data.name: ShouldntReuseEventIdsTitle
data.value: Multiple logging methods cannot use the same event id within a class

data.name: ShouldntReuseEventIdsMessage
data.value: Multiple logging methods are using event id {0} in class {1}

data.name: LoggingMethodMustReturnVoidMessage
data.value: Logging methods must return void

data.name: MissingLoggerArgumentTitle
data.value: One of the arguments to a static logging method must implement the Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger interface

data.name: MissingLoggerArgumentMessage
data.value: One of the arguments to the static logging method '{0}' must implement the Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger interface

data.name: LoggingMethodShouldBeStaticMessage
data.value: Logging methods must be static

data.name: LoggingMethodMustBePartialMessage
data.value: Logging methods must be partial

data.name: LoggingMethodIsGenericMessage
data.value: Logging methods cannot be generic

data.name: ShouldntMentionInTemplateMessage
data.value: Don't include a template for {0} in the logging message since it is implicitly taken care of

data.name: ShouldntMentionExceptionInMessageTitle
data.value: Don't include exception parameters as templates in the logging message

data.name: RedundantQualifierInMessageMessage
data.value: Remove redundant qualifier (Info:, Warning:, Error:, etc) from the logging message since it is implicit in the specified log level.

data.name: RedundantQualifierInMessageTitle
data.value: Redundant qualifier in logging message

data.name: ArgumentHasNoCorrespondingTemplateMessage
data.value: Argument '{0}' is not referenced from the logging message

data.name: ArgumentHasNoCorrespondingTemplateTitle
data.value: Argument is not referenced from the logging message

data.name: TemplateHasNoCorrespondingArgumentMessage
data.value: Template {0} is not provided as argument to the logging method

data.name: TemplateHasNoCorrespondingArgumentTitle
data.value: Logging template has no corresponding method argument

data.name: LoggingMethodHasBodyMessage
data.value: Logging methods cannot have a body

data.name: MissingLogLevelMessage
data.value: A LogLevel value must be supplied in the LoggerMessage attribute or as a parameter to the logging method

data.name: ShouldntMentionLogLevelInMessageTitle
data.value: Don't include log level parameters as templates in the logging message

data.name: ShouldntMentionLoggerInMessageTitle
data.value: Don't include logger parameters as templates in the logging message

data.name: MissingLoggerFieldMessage
data.value: Couldn't find a field of type Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger in class {0}

data.name: MissingLoggerFieldTitle
data.value: Couldn't find a field of type Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger

data.name: MultipleLoggerFieldsMessage
data.value: Found multiple fields of type Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger in class {0}

data.name: MultipleLoggerFieldsTitle
data.value: Found multiple fields of type Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger

data.name: InconsistentTemplateCasingMessage
data.value: Can't have the same template with different casing

data.name: MalformedFormatStringsMessage
data.value: Can't have malformed format strings (like dangling {, etc)

data.name: GeneratingForMax6ArgumentsMessage
data.value: Generating more than 6 arguments is not supported
